data.actual_result: I'm able to select suggestion that i can't see and without being scrolled to the right
data.expected_result: the suggestions that aren't on screen shouldn't be selectable or the suggestions modal should scroll to the right when highlighting them
data.short_description: when selecting /giphy or tenor suggestions using arrow up/down keys, it won't scroll you for off-screen results but lets you blindly select them
data.steps_to_repro: - go to any text channel - search something using either /giphy or /tenor - use the arrow ↓ down key to highlight/select suggestions - notice how you're able to select suggestions that aren't on screen
